.en-index-accordion-list{list-style:none;font:bold 1.5rem/2rem "SlidoSansFont",verdana,arial,sans-serif;padding-left:0;margin-top:3.5rem}@media (min-width: 48em){.en-index-accordion-list{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}}.en-index-accordion-list li{position:relative;padding-top:1rem;padding-left:3rem;text-align:left}@media (min-width: 48em){.en-index-accordion-list li{padding-top:0}}.en-index-accordion-list li:before{content:url(/build/img/index/checkmark-icon-291701ba4d7dcc429376e3197e73fb5b.svg);position:absolute;left:0}
